page.syntax: Toolbar_Title as C = a5_system_toolbar_show(P vars ,P toolbar_property_string [,C relative_position [,L flagGlobal ]])

argument.name: vars
argument.description: A pointer to the variable frame.

page.description: Shows a system toolbar. The toolbar_property_string is returned by the appropriate function. e.g. a5_form_toolbar() etc.
page.discussion: The A5_SYSTEM_TOOLBAR_SHOW() function displays a previously loaded toolbar. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim vl as P dim tbar as P vl = local_variables() tbar = a5_toolbar_def_load("Invoice") a5_system_toolbar_show(vl,tbar) ? properties_enum(tbar) = dlg_title pre_toolbar_init dlg_horizontal dlg_vertical dlg_float event_code ? tbar.dlg_title = "Form View"

see.ref: How to Design a Custom Toolbar
